Articles.Content:
i have seen several mod that come with a source file.

now where do i put those? i know there is a Resource map in the ksp game file but i don`t know if i must place them there.

Hi aryon, the source files are just the source code for the plugins, in case you want to inspect them, they don't actually have to go anywhere and are not used by the plugins themselves, you don't even have to extract them
